name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GP LITE: FB™️ Group Bulk Poster - Simple, Free, Easy Posting -

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bulk post to Facebook groups with ease. Facebook group management, bulk posting, automate group posting.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GP LITE is the free, simplified version of the original Group Posting PRO. GroupPosting is a powerful Chrome extension designed to streamline and automate your posting activities within Facebook groups. Whether you're managing multiple communities or promoting your content across various groups, GroupPosting simplifies the process, saving you time and effort. With intuitive controls, you can schedule posts, manage media uploads, and ensure your messages reach the right audiences seamlessly. Enhance your social media strategy with GroupPosting's efficient and user-friendly interface.
